SummaryEnglish: The world of middle school girls' ping pong enters an age of heated rivalry as the throne at its apex is surrendered... Koyori Tsumujikaze, a girl who loves ping pong, has just transferred to Suzumegahara Middle School. Along with her friends who strive to be the national champions, can Koyori bring the winds of change to the school?! The curtain is about to rise on a scorching hot tale of girls who love ping pong!

1.SummaryEnglish: Kamiya Agari is the ace of the Suzumegahara Table Tennis Team, but the arrival of Tsumujikaze Koyori reinvigorates the team and puts her place under threat.

2.SummaryEnglish: Agari feels more and more threatened by Koyori's rapid rise up the rankings, and she comes to a decision...

3.SummaryEnglish: Agari and Koyori face off in an all-out battle for the top spot.

4.SummaryEnglish: The table tennis team is shaken up by news that its captain is returning to the fold.

5.TitleEnglish: I Want to Feel My Heart Race with You
5.SummaryEnglish: Only Agari and Koyori stand between Kiruka and her perfect victory.

6.SummaryEnglish: Koyori needs new rubbers for her racket but can't pay for them, so she decides to work at Hokuto's specialized goods store.

7.TitleEnglish: The Ability of the National Schools
7.SummaryEnglish: In a practice match against Mozuyama, a team that made a Nationals appearance, the Suzumegahara girls learn just what took them there.

8.SummaryEnglish: Can Munemune and Kiruka claw one back in doubles and keep the match going?

9.SummaryEnglish: Agari faces Mozuyama's captain, Zakuro, in a bid to make both Koyori's and her heart race.

10.SummaryEnglish: Koyori takes on Kururi in the final round of the practice match. Will she able to counter her opponent's curve drive and make her heart race?

11.SummaryEnglish: The Suzumegahara Table Tennis Team heads off on a training camp to prepare for the upcoming summer tournament.

12.TitleEnglish: Together, We Can Go as Far as We Want
12.SummaryEnglish: The team's training camp comes to an end, as each member of the team works on the issues they've identified. Will Agari be able to overcome hers?
